channel.title: iXat help! please
channel.description: [font=comic sans ms][size=18pt]Ok guys, I want to make a iXat or xat private server! It's been bugging me for awhile and I would love it if someone showed me how or whatever! Thanks! This might be in the wrong section but I'm kinda new![/size][/font]

item.title: iXat help! please
item.dc:creator: @eyeownyew Eyeownyew
item.description:
@eyeownyew wrote:

[quote=“Whackatre, post:3, topic:445839”][quote author=eyeownyew link=topic=548699.msg4022234#msg4022234 date=1340094007]
What? your post made no sense whatsoever

If you mean a Xat chatbox: http://xat.com/web_gear/chat.php

Have fun, but Xat is annoying as fuck
[/quote]

I don’t know what you’re talking about. His post makes perfect sense to me.

This might help: http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,532917.msg3895220.html

Please give up Xat though.[/quote]
Oh, I didn’t even know that existed. No wonder it didn’t make sense

Read full topic
